ActCorrections and Conditional Release Act
PrecisAppointment of RICKY H. HEAD of Oakville, Manitoba, to be a full-time member of the Prairie Regional Division of the Parole Board of Canada, to hold office during good behaviour for a period of five years, effective March 29, 2021.
